description:
Bright, clear and ultra-compact for pack-in treks or going fast and light. Multi-coated optics give you maximum light transmission and crisp views, and this monocular version cuts down on weight compared to full binoculars.

  • Durable rubber-armor coating with weather-resistant housing
  • BaK-7 prism glass for excellent clarity
  • Multi-coated optics offer true-to-life images
  • Fold down eyecups work with or without eyewear
  • Wrist strap and carrying case included
name: Tasco 10x25 Monocular
